title: Ann Callender - Pathways Through Pain: Women's Journeys (pdf)
description:
Ann Callender - Pathways Through Pain: Women's Journeys (Pilgrim Press, 1999). 146 pages.

New scan. Searchable pdf (clearscan) with contents in bookmarks, accurate pagination and metadata, etc.


description:

Pathways through Pain places personal chronic pain in dialogue with Christian women mystics -- women who used their own suffering as a means of connecting with God through Christ. After setting out to learn from the mystics and to engage their insights with her own experience, Ann Callender reveals how to deal with unbearable pain and how to discover pain's potential as a constructive agent of healing.
